Ingredients.1: 2 pounds boneless beef sirloin or beef top round steaks (3/4 thick)

Ingredients.3: 1 (10.5 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Beef Broth

Ingredients.8: 1 head Chinese cabbage (bok choy), thinly sliced

Ingredients.9: 2 medium red peppers, cut into 2-long strips

Ingredients.11: 2 medium green onions, cut into 2 pieces

Ingredients.12: 1 Hot cooked regular long-grain white rice

Directions.1: Slice beef into very thin strips.

Directions.2: Mix cornstarch, broth, soy and sugar until smooth. Set aside.

Directions.3: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in saucepot or wok over high heat. Add beef in 2 batches and stir-fry until browned. Set beef aside.

Directions.4: Add 1 tablespoon oil. Add the mushrooms, cabbage, peppers, celery and green onions in 2 batches and stir-fry over medium heat until tender-crisp. Set vegetables aside.

Directions.5: Stir cornstarch mixture and add. Cook until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly. Return beef and vegetables to saucepot and heat through. Serve over rice.
